full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SNGAGS KYI SA LAM GYI RNAM PAR BZHAG PA ZUNG 'JUG RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): PAndI TA SMRI TI DZNY'A NA KIRTI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI GNAM GYI LHA 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN PO'I LUNG GIS S'A M'I TI PAKshI RA BSNGAGS PA, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I MCHOG SPRUL BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB 'JIGS MED PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL LA RIM GNYIS KYI KHRID LUNG 'BUL SKABS, ,GANG DE'I YONGS 'DZIN CHEN PO MKHAS BTZUN BZANG PO'I YON TAN PHUL DU BYUNG BA MDZOD DGE @024B DGA' LDAN RAB RGYAS GLING GI KHRI ZUR KLU 'BUM LHA RAMS PA BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO NAS NAN CHEN POS BSKUL ZHING, NYE CHAR CHOS GRVA CHEN PO DGA' LDAN MDO SNGAGS BSHAD SGRUB 'PHEL RGYAS GLING GI BLO GSAL BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I CHED DU, ,RGYUD BSHAD SLOB DPON LUNG RIGS SMRA BA'I DBANG PO SHEL DKAR MKHAN PO BLO BZANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS SOGS DON GNYER CAN DU MAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, RIM LNGA GSAL SGRON DANG, 'KHRID YIG ZAB DON GSAL BA'I NYI MA,  SA LAM SKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS, ,RIM LNGA RANG LUGS SNYING PO, ,SA LAM RIN CHEN THEM SKAS, ,RIM LNGA SRID PO BCUD BSDUS, ,GSANG CHEN GTER SOGS 'DI SKOR GYI YIG CHA MANG PO LA ZHIB TU BRTAGS TE, ,YUL GANGS CAN GYI LTE BAR SKYES SHING, THUN MONG DANG THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I SHES BYA'I GNAS DU MA LA BLO GROS KYI SNANG BA CUNG ZAD RGYAS PA, SNGAGS BAN GYI NA BA DPAL DBANG CHEN GAR GYI DBANG PHYUG DGYES RAB RDO RJER 'BOD PAS, ,'PHAGS YUL GYI PAndI TA SMRI TI DZNY'A NA KIRTI'I LAB LUNG DPAL GYI LHA SA ZHES BSNGAGS PA'I BCOM LDAN MI BKSYOD RDO RJE'I DKYIL 'KHOR MTHIL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
